name: Isang Palayok, Isang Pamalo, Isang Libong Boses (One Pot, One Bat, One Thousand Voices)
name_original: Isang Palayok, Isang Pamalo, Isang Libong Boses (One Pot, One Bat, One Thousand Voices)
description:
(Global Game Jam 2018)
It's a 'sound' focus game who's main focus is to break the Pot. You search for the 'right voice' to follow among other sounds.
